com.jlranta.pholiotracker.portfolio

Class Portfolio

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jlranta.pholiotracker.portfolio.Portfolio

  • public class Portfolio
extends Object
    The Portfolio class represents and keeps track of the user's investment portfolio.
    Author:
    Jarkko Lehtoranta

      • buySecurity

        public boolean buySecurity(StockSearchResult sr,
                           Double p,
                           Integer a,
                           Date t)
        Buy more of a single security.
        Parameters:
        sr - The stock search result
        p - The buy price of a single security
        a - The amount to buy
        t - The time of the transaction
        Returns:
        true, if the transaction succeeds. Otherwise return false.
